text: Domus de Maria (Dòmus de Marìa) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sud Sardegna in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 1,656 people lived there. Its area is 97.14 km². It is 66 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of South Sardinia
title: Domus de Maria
